content: vivaldi winter mitts is the fourth pair in ***the four seasons collection *** it is widely believed that antonio vivaldi s inspiration for the four seasons stems from the time he spent as the court chapel master in the gorgeous countryside of mantua italy this is winter stillness and quiet the scent of wood smoke curling from chimneys and silent gently falling snow these mitts are sized for tiny smallish and larger hands using heavier yarn and larger needles for a lacier mitt the cream speckled mitts were knit with a needle 1/2 size larger than recommended the pattern is written for magic loop but can easily be adapted for dpns the lace portion is rhythmic intuitive easy to memorize and is written and charted vivaldi winter mitts have been test knit in lieu of paying a fee for this pattern please consider making a donation to world central kitchen since 2010 **world central** **kitchen** has been providing meals to communities affected by conflict natural disasters and climate crisis all over the world **https //wck org**
